controller.server

Class ServerCommands

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.server.ServerCommands

  • public class ServerCommands
extends java.lang.Object
    ServerCommands class. Contains some static commands that can be executed on the server. Are usually called from the CommandInterpreter.
    Author:
    Bit 4 - Group 4

    • Method Detail

      • setServerObject

        public static void setServerObject(Server inputServerObject)
        ServerCommands constructor.
        Parameters:
        inputServerObject - Parent server object.

      • clientConnects

        public static void clientConnects(java.lang.String[] args,
                                  Peer peer)
        Method to be exected if a client executes the "connect" command. Changes client's name and (maybe) enables chat.
        Parameters:
        args - Arguments sent after the "connect" command by the client
        peer - The peer that sent the command

      • sendChat

        public static void sendChat(java.lang.String[] args,
                            Peer sendingPeer)
        method used when a peer tries to send chat. Sends chat to all peers in the room that want to receive chat.
        Parameters:
        args - Arguments sent after the "connect" command by the client
        sendingPeer - The peer that sent the command

      • clientRequests

        public static void clientRequests(java.lang.String[] args,
                                  Peer peer)
        method used when a peer tries sends the "request" command. Sends the appropriate "waiting" command with sendWaiting. Checks if other players are waiting for games with the same amount of players. If so, runs createGame. Repeats this until there are no new games that can be created.
        Parameters:
        args - Arguments sent after the "connect" command by the client
        peer - The peer that sent the command
